seo.encrypt-description: Baro sida sirta AES ula shaqeyso jileeyaha tallaabo-tallaabo ee AES Adventure. Waxay taageertaa dhammaan saddexda cabbir ee muhiimka ah waxayna leedahay casharro kaa caawinaya hagidda waxbarashadaada!
seo.decrypt-description: Baro sida furida AES ay ula shaqeyso AES Adventure's simulator-tallaabo. Waxay taageertaa dhammaan saddexda cabbir ee muhiimka ah waxayna leedahay casharro kaa caawinaya hagidda waxbarashadaada!
seo.expand-description: Baro sida balaadhinta furaha AES ula shaqeyso jileeyaha tallaabo-tallaabo ee AES Adventure. Waxay taageertaa dhammaan saddexda cabbir ee muhiimka ah waxayna leedahay casharro kaa caawinaya hagidda waxbarashadaada!
seo.feedback-description: Sii jawaab celintaada qiimaha leh hal-abuurka AES Adventure si aan u wanaajino khibradda qof walba.
seo.guide-description: Baro sida aad uga faa'iidaysan lahayd AES Adventure.
seo.home-description: Ku soo dhawoow AES Adventure, qalab waxbarasho oo dareen leh AES. Geli xogtaada oo ku dhex soco sirta tallaabo-tallaabo sireed, fur-furis, iyo ballaarinta furaha dhammaan saddexda cabbir ee muhiimka ah.
seo.preferences-description: Beddel sida AES Adventure u ekaado si ay ugu habboonaato baahiyahaaga.

home.description: Heerarka sirta sare waa kan ugu caansan sifaynta-furaha. Haddii aad rabto inaad barato aasaaska, qoto dheer u geli faahfaahinta, ama tijaabi AES: waxaad joogtaa meesha saxda ah!

intro.body: Heerarka sirta sare waa symmetric block , taasoo la macno ah in ay sirayso/qorito baloogyada cabbirka go'an oo wata hal fure oo keliya. Adventure AES wuxuu AES u kala qaybiyaa 3 hannaan oo aasaasi ah: sir, furfurid, iyo balaadhinta furaha. Balaadhinta furaha waa ka-soocida furaha-hoosaadka furaha gelinta – furayaashan hoose waxaa isticmaala sirin iyo fur-fur labadaba. Mid kasta oo ka mid ah dhinacyadan adag ee AES waxay ku leeyihiin jileeyaha AES Adventure kaasoo kugu socon doona sida AES uga shaqeyso fikradaada. AES Adventure waxay taageertaa dhammaan cabbirrada muhiimka ah ee 3 ee ay isticmaasho AES: 128, 192 iyo 256 bits. Fiiro gaar ah: Dhammaan xogta AES Adventure waxa lagu matalay hexadecimal; 1 nambar hexadecimal waa 4 bits = 1 nibble = 0.5 bytes.

animations.body: Dhammaan jilayaasha waxay isticmaalaan animations si ay si cad u muujiyaan tallaabo kasta oo habka. Animations-yadani waxay taageeraan ciyaarta, hakinta iyo raadinta hawlgallada. Xawaaraha dib-u-ciyaarista dhammaan animations waa la labanlaabmi karaa ama waa la dhimi karaa iyadoo la adeegsanayo calaamadaha bakaylaha iyo qoolleyda siday u kala horreeyaan. Tallaabo kasta waxay yeelan doontaa badhan si aad ugu gudubto tallaabada xigta - haddii aad baranayso tallaabada, waxaa lagula talinayaa inaadan dhaqaaqin ilaa badhanka uu noqdo mid sare loo qaadayo (taas oo guud ahaan dhacda dhamaadka dhamaadka animation).

tutorials.body: Dhammaan simulatorsku waxay leeyihiin astaamo waxbarasho oo ku kala firirsan. Si aad u hesho sharraxaad qoraal ah oo ku saabsan waxa summada ku ag taal, dhagsii sumadda casharrada si aad u ballaadhiso barbar-socodka jilbaha oo aad muujiso casharrada u dhigma. Barta dhinaceeda ayaa si toos ah ugu soo noqon doonta cabbirkii asalka ahaa adiga oo gujinaya isla summada waxbaridda ama u gudbi doonta tallaabada xigta. Taas beddelkeeda, ballaca bar-side-ka ayaa gacanta lagu hagaajin karaa iyadoo la adeegsanayo gacanta-jiididda ee midigta hoose.

configuration.body: Simulatorada sirta iyo furista waxay taageertaa qaabaynta xaddidan oo ay isticmaali karaan isticmaalayaasha horumarsan si ay ugu tijaabiyaan AES. Habayntan waxa laga heli karaa Configure moodalka bidix ee boggan. Fiiro gaar ah: beddelka qaabaynta waxay dib u dajin doontaa simuliyeyaasha sireed iyo furista

persistence.body: Dhamaan xaalada AES Adventure waxa lagu kaydiyay barowsarkaaga kaydka maxaliga ah oo wata furayaal ka bilaabma 'AES_ADVENTURE_UI__' . Tani waxay ka dhigan tahay haddii aad xirto ama ka tagto AES Adventure, wax-ka-jiliyeed kasta oo hadda socda ayaa si buuxda loo soo celin doonaa markaad soo noqoto. Haddii, sabab kasta ha noqotee, codsigu galo xaalad jaban, waxay noqon kartaa dib u dejin adag adiga oo tirtiraya xogtiisa kaydka maxalliga ah oo dib u cusbooneysiinaya bogga.

duplicate-buttons.body: Marka aagga wax gelinta ahi buuxo, waxaad arki doontaa 1 ama 2 nuqul badhamada summada. Badhanka kowaad waa badhanka caadiga ah ee koobi-ka-boodhka. Midka labaad waxa uu leeyahay hawl fududayn-isticmaalka oo gaar ah oo ku xidhan hadba qaybta ay ka hoosayso. Hoosta soo saarida 'Ciphertext' ee sireed: koobiyo qoraalka ciphertext ilaa galinta jilbaha furista. Hoosta soo saarida 'Plaintext' ee decryption: koobiyo qoraalka cad ilaa galinta simulatorka sirta ah. Hoosta wax kasta oo muhiim ah: koobiyeynta furaha dhammaan jilayaasha kale - tani waxay si gaar ah faa'iido u leedahay in si dhakhso leh loogu isticmaalo furaha isku midka ah sirta, fur-furista iyo ballaarinta furaha. Fiiro gaar ah: haddii hawlgalka nuqulku wax ka beddelo gelinta, jileeyaha bartilmaameedka ayaa dib loo dajin doonaa maaddaama wax-soo-gelinta aan la beddeli karin jilitaanka dhexe.

i18n.body: Luuqadda abka oo dhan waxa lagu beddeli karaa dookhyada. Turjumaadahaan waxaa la filayaa inay noqdaan kuwo aan dhammaystirnayn; Ma aan kireyn turjubaano xirfad leh si ay u sameeyaan tarjumaan. Dhawaan, waxaa jiri doona hab aad ku codsato hagaajin/sixitaan faylalka luqadda ee kaydiya tarjumaadaha oo dhan.

quick-points.cant-input: Xog gelinta lama beddeli karo haddii jileeyaha uu hadda isticmaalayo. Ku dhufo badhanka 'Dib u dajinta' si aad uga baxdo jilitaanka hadda waxaad awoodi doontaa inaad wax ka beddesho gelinta hal mar.
quick-points.cant-start: Simulators lama bilaabi karo ilaa dhammaan aagagga wax gelinta loo baahan yahay laga buuxiyo. Dhammaan aagagga wax la geliyo waxay yeelan doonaan miiska 'nibbles' oo ka hooseeya iyaga.
quick-points.nibble: 1 nibble dabcan waa nus byte! (Sidoo kale u dhiganta 1 nambar hexadecimal)
quick-points.small: AES Adventure waxaa loogu talagalay in lagu daawado shaashadaha ugu yaraan 13" cabbirkoodu yahay Haddii aad ku jirto mobaylka, u rogi aaladda qaabka muuqaalka si aad u hesho ballac dheeraad ah intii suurtagal ah.

feedback.title: Jawaab celin
feedback.body: Kani waa mashruuc horumarinaya waxaanan jeclaan lahayn inaan ka helno jawaab celintaada qalabka. Waxa jira {googleFormLink} oo aad buuxin karto si aad na siiso macluumaad aad u qiimo badan - fikradahaaga! Haddii kale, hal-abuurayaasha AES Adventure ayaa hoos ku taxan, xor u ah inaad noo soo dirto iimayl haddii aad wax ka qabto qalabka.

preferences.title: Dookhyada
preferences.badLang: Luuqadaada si liidata ma loo turjumay mise lama heli karo?

modal.title: Habee
modal.body: Hoos ka dooro qaabaynta Haddii aad ku cusub tahay AES, waxaan kugula talineynaa inaad isticmaasho simulator-ka caadiga ah ka hor intaadan isticmaalin qaabeyntan. Fiiro gaar ah: beddelka qaabaynta waxay dib u dajin doontaa simuliyeyaasha sireed iyo furista

simulator.no-mix-columns-last: Demiyay sababtoo ah Isku-dhafka Tiirarka ayaa laga booday wareegii u dambeeyay!
simulator.no-mix-columns-first: Demiyay sababtoo ah Mix Columns waa laga booday wareegga koowaad!
simulator.no-step-configuration: Demiyay sababtoo ah qaabeynta la doortay ayaa ah
simulator.no-h-function-key-size: Demiyay sababtoo ah cabbirka furuhu maaha 256 bits!
simulator.no-h-function-last: Demiyay sababtoo ah ℎ -function waxa loo isticmaalaa in lagu dhaliyo kelmadda 5aad balse 4 kelmadood ayaa la soo saaray wareega ugu dambeeya!
simulator.disabled-input: Guji badhanka 'Dib u habeyn' si aad awood ugu yeelato tafatirka
simulator.disabled-start: Buuxi gelinta(yada) si aad awood ugu yeelatid jilitaanka

default.description: Guji {tutorialIcon} oo aad aragto si aad u muujiso macluumaadka khuseeya halkan.

plaintext-to-state.body: Talaabada ugu horeysa waa in la abuuro jaantuska gobolka kaas oo lagu shaqeyn doono inta lagu jiro habka sirta. Qoraalka cad waxaa loo habeeyey 4x4 matrix of bytes ka dibna shaxanka waa la bedelay.

ciphertext-to-state.body: Talaabada ugu horeysa waa in la abuuro jaantuska gobolka ee lagu shaqeyn doono inta lagu jiro habka kala saarida. Qoraalka ciphertext waxaa loo habeeyey 4x4 matrix of bytes ka dibna shaxanka waa la bedelay.

key-to-state.body: Talaabada ugu horeysa waa in la abuuro vector-ka gobolka kaas oo lagu dhejin doono inta lagu jiro habka balaadhinta muhiimka ah. Furaha waxa loo habeeyey qayb erayo ah, halkaas oo 1 kelmad uu yahay 4 bytes. Jadwalka muhiimka ah ee AES wax yar ayuu isu beddelaa cabbir kasta oo fure ah , laakiin had iyo jeer waa ku jihaysan kelmad.

add-key.body: Furaha waxa lagu xardhay shaxanka gobolka. Ogsoonow in furaha sidoo kale loo habeeyey 4x4 matrix of bytes oo la beddelay, sida gelinta. Tan waxa kale oo loo yaqaan caddaynta furaha .

add-round-key.body: Furaha wareega waxa lagu XOR oo la socda jaantuska gobolka. Ogsoonow in furaha wareega sidoo kale loo habeeyey 4x4 matrix of bytes oo la bedelay. U gudub tabka Balaadhinta Furaha si aad u barato sida furayaasha wareega loo abuuray. Inta lagu jiro sirta , furayaasha wareega waxaa loo isticmaalaa sida ay u kala horreeyaan. Inta lagu jiro decryption , furayaasha wareega waxa loo isticmaalaa ka soo horjeeda .

add-words.body: Erayga ugu horreeya waxa lagu xardhay ereyga u dambeeya, ka dib markii wareegga 𝑔 -shaqo lagu soo rogey. Halkaa waxaa laga soo qaadayaa kelmad kasta oo lagu xardhay eraygii hore ee la xisaabiyay si loo abuuro kelmad cusub oo markaas lagu dhejiyo vector-ka gobolka. Jadwalka furaha 256-bit wuxuu ku baaqayaa Wareegga ℎ -shaqaynta kelmada 4aad ee wareegga ka hor inta aan loo sii wadan sidii caadiga ahayd.

round-g-fn.body: Shaqada 𝑔 -shaqadu waxay ka kooban tahay hawlo taxane ah oo ku saabsan bytes ka erayga gelinta: Beddel Baytaha, Shift Rows (shift = 1), iyo byte ugu horreeya waxa lagu XOR leh wareeg joogto ah Baytyada ayaa markaa la isku dhejiyaa si ay u sameeyaan ereyga wax soo saarka.

round-h-fn.body: Shaqada ℎ -shaqada waxay ka kooban tahay Beddelka Bytes ee byteska ereyga gelinta. Baytyada ayaa markaa la isku dhejiyaa si ay u sameeyaan ereyga wax soo saarka.

round-keys.body: Furayaashan hoose waxa loo qaataa siday u kala horreeyaan marka la qarinayo. Inta lagu jiro decryption , waxaa loo adeegsadaa si ka soo horjeeda.

rounds-header.body: AES waxay ku shaqeysaa shaxanka gobolka wareegyo. 10 wareeg oo cabbirka muhiimka ah ee 128 bits, 12 wareegyo 192 bits, iyo 14 wareegyo 256 bits. Wareeg kastaa wuxuu ka kooban yahay tillaabooyinka Beddel Baytka, Safafka Shift, Isku-dhafka Tiirarka, Ku dar Furaha Wareegga; marka laga reebo wareegga u dambeeya, kaas oo aan ku jirin Tiirarka isku dhafan . Inta lagu jiro decryption , tillaabooyinka waxaa loo fuliyaa sida kasoo horjeeda

key-rounds-header.body: Wareeg kasta oo AES ah wuxuu u baahan yahay fure-hoosaad, oo lagu daray 1 caddaynta furaha. 11 subkeys ee cabbirka muhiimka ah ee 128 bits, 13 subkeys ee 192 bits, iyo 15 subkeys ee 256 bits. Wareeg kastaa wuxuu ku shaqeeyaa wax soo saarkii wareeggii hore si uu u keeno kelmado cusub.
key-rounds-header.aes-a: AES Adventure waxay u kala baxdaa wareeg kasta ku dar Erayada, Wareegga 𝑔 -function and Round ℎ - tallaabo tallaabo. Kaliya jadwalka muhiimka ah 256-bit ayaa isticmaala Wareegga ℎ -tallaabada shaqada wareeg kasta, marka laga reebo wareegga u dambeeya.
key-rounds-header.note: Wareeg kasta waxa uu soo saaraa 1 subkeys oo ah cabbirka muhiimka ah ee 128-bits, 1.5 subkeys ee 192-bits, iyo 2 subkeys ee 256-bits, marka laga reebo wareegga u dambeeya oo soo saara 1 subkeys dhammaan saddexda cabbir ee muhiimka ah.

rounds-stats.diffusion:
Faafsanaan waa saamaynta hal qoraal oo cad ku leeyahay qoraalka (hadda). Qiyaasta waxa lagu matalay AES Adventure saamaynta avalanche Tan waxaa loo xisaabiyaa sida soo socota: qoraal kasta oo cad, rogo oo ku xisaabi qoraalka (hadda) oo wata qoraal cad oo wax laga beddelay. Ka dib, tiri tirada jajabyada la rogrogay ee qoraalka (hadda): mitirku waa celceliska tirada jajabyada la rogay dhammaan kala duwanaanshaha qoraalka cad.
Safafka Shift and Mix Columns waxaa laga yaabaa in si wada jir ah loogu yeero lakabka fidinta sababtoo ah waa tallaabooyinka faafin ee ugu weyn ee AES.
rounds-stats.confusion:
Jahwareerka waa xidhiidhka ka dhexeeya qoraalka (hadda) iyo furaha. Halbeegga waxaa lagu matalay AES Adventure iyadoo la eegayo xiriirka ka dhexeeya qoraalka (hadda) iyo furaha kaas oo dhammaan 0s lagu sameeyay -1s.
Beddelka Bytes wuxuu soo bandhigaa jahawareer AES.

sub-bytes.body: Beddelka Bytes-ka wuxuu ku beddelaa byte-ga matrix-ka gobol kasta oo leh byte ka soo baxay sanduuqa beddelka, kaas oo bixiya aan toos ahayn ee AES (ka ilaalinta weerarrada falanqaynta). Waa khariidad mug weyn; inta lagu jiro daahfurinta , waxaanu isticmaalnaa roga ee sanduuqa beddelka.

shift-rows.body: Shift Rows wuxuu sameeyaa wareeg wareeg ah oo caqli gal ah saf kasta oo ka mid ah shaxanka gobolka. Inta lagu jiro decryption , isbeddelku waxa uu u socdaa ka soo horjeeda jihada. Labada xaaladoodba, wareegtada safka hore waa 0, taasoo la macno ah safka koowaad waligiis ma saameeyo.

mix-columns.body: Isku-dhafka Tiirarka waxa uu ku dhuftaa halbeeg kasta oo ka mid ah tiiradaha shax-goboleedka iyadoo loo eegayo jaangooyooyin joogto ah si loo soo saaro tiirka u dhigma ee matrix-ka gobolka ee ka dhashay. Matrixka joogtada ahi waa mid aan leexleexan karin; inta lagu guda jiro decryption , waxaanu isticmaalnaa roga ee matrixka joogtada ah.

state-to-ciphertext.body: Talaabada ugu danbeysa waa in la abuuro ciphertext kaas oo ah soo saarida habka sirta. Matrix-ka gobolka ayaa la beddelay ka dibna gelitaan kasta waa la isku dhejiyay.

state-to-plaintext.body: Talaabada ugu danbeysa waa in la abuuro qoraal cad oo ah wax soo saarka habka kala saarista Matrix-ka gobolka ayaa la beddelay ka dibna gelitaan kasta waa la isku dhejiyay.

state-to-round-keys.body: Tallaabada ugu dambeysa waa in la abuuro furayaasha wareega kuwaas oo ah wax soo saarka habka ballaarinta muhiimka ah. Ereyada vector-ka gobolka waxaa la qaadaa 4 mar ka dibna koox kasta waa la isku dhejiyaa si ay u sameeyaan fure-hoosaad.

hexArea.duplicated-keys: Lagu koobiyeeyay dhammaan agabyada muhiimka ah
hexArea.duplicated-plaintext: La koobiyeeyay si loo xafido galinta
hexArea.duplicated-ciphertext: La koobiyeeyay si loo furfuro gelinta
hexArea.fill-tooltip: Ku buuxi gelinta aan tooska ahayn
hexArea.duplicate-keys-tooltip: Ku koobi dhammaan agabyada muhiimka ah
hexArea.duplicate-plaintext-tooltip: Nuqul si aad u qorto gelida
hexArea.duplicate-ciphertext-tooltip: Nuqul si aad u dejiso gelinta

simulator.layer-off: Lakabku waa off . Jooji oo habee si aad u shido.
simulator.layer-on: Lakabku waa shid . Jooji oo habee si aad u damiso.
simulator.skip-full: U bood si aad u soo saarto
